name: places/ChIJSca3He9YwokRAwo1kX5CBpY
formattedAddress: 105 E 63rd St #1A, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 105 E 63rd St #1A, New York, NY 10065-7329, USA

originalText.text:
Best dentist in Manhattan!
I was recommended to Dr. Oro about 2 years ago and I haven't looked back! He is extremely personable and truly cares about all of his patients. As soon as you walk into his office doors, you feel as if you are a part of their family. Great service and great atmosphere! Highly recommend!!!

text.text:
Best dentist in Manhattan!
I was recommended to Dr. Oro about 2 years ago and I haven't looked back! He is extremely personable and truly cares about all of his patients. As soon as you walk into his office doors, you feel as if you are a part of their family. Great service and great atmosphere! Highly recommend!!!

originalText.text:
I haven’t been to the dentist in about 2-3 years
(Gross i know) i had a horrible experience with a previous dentist that unlocked a near fear in me and i was so terrified to go back. I know i needed to shake that fear for the sake of my teeth. I work right around the block from the office of dr Jaime oro so it was super convenient. I was blown away by how nice and professional everyone was. Dr Morada did my cleaning she was so gentle but very thorough. Dr oro came in to check out my teeth and confirm I’m okay and so are my teeth. I don’t think I’ve ever been so comfortable at a dentist. Thank you so much. 10/10 would strongly recommend.

originalText.text: Dr. Oro is amazing. I have been seeing him for well over 10 years and every experience has been wonderful. He is generous and treats his patients with respect and kindness. Many friends and family also go to him and we love it there. Negative reviews are not representative of this practice!

text.text: Dr. Oro is amazing. I have been seeing him for well over 10 years and every experience has been wonderful. He is generous and treats his patients with respect and kindness. Many friends and family also go to him and we love it there. Negative reviews are not representative of this practice!

originalText.text: I just saw some negative reviews and had to write this. Dr. Oro is "THE" best dentist in the tri-state area. I had two crowns that kept popping off with other dentists. Upon meeting Dr. Oro for the first time, he made no false promises and redid my crowns. They are still intact just as when he did them over TEN YEARS AGO!!  Dr. Oro takes pride in his work and has compassion for his patients. He actually calls to see how you're feeling after an appointment. Who does that anymore? Long story short - If you are in need of a meticulous, trustworthy, and just all around great dentist look no further. Also, the girls in the office are the sweetest!

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Jamie for a few years now. I’ve had two cavities, one root canal and several cleanings. With every visit, Jamie and his staff has made my visit pain free. The entire office exemplifies excellence and professionalism. I will continue to travel from Long Island to Manhattan to see him simply because it’s worth it.
